I am a native Japanese speaker who has been living here more than 25 years. 
I am a native Japanese speaker (female) and a certified Japanese language teacher. I studied Japanese literature and linguistics at college in Japan and I taught Japanese to Japanese students as well as non-Japanese students in Japan as well as in the US. 
The focus of my lessons is conversational Japanese, grammar, reading and writing ("Hiragana", "Katakana" and some "Kanji"), depending on the student's level.  Also we can customize what you like to focus.  While I speak fluent English, lessons are taught mostly in Japanese, with occasional English explanation. Also I like my students get interested in Japanese culture, so I introduce culture aspects a lot. 

My lessons are suited for those who:
- are planning to travel to Japan in the near future and would like to improve their Japanese (beginner / intermediate)
- are interested in Japanese culture and would like to learn about this culture through language
- want to start learning Japanese (beginner)
- want to improve their Japanese communication skills (intermediate)

You do not have to go to Manhattan to learn Japanese. We can meet at Newport, grove Street. 
Rate:
$40/hour in-person 
or 
$30/hour for 2 people group lesson


If you have any questions, please do not hesitate and send me an e-mail.
title: Let's learn and improve your Japanese speaking skills w/ correct Pronu

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Estimado / Estimada,

Somos la escuela OPMI y ofrecemos a usted cursos de ESL, TOEFL y cursos vocacionales. Estamos ubicados en el bajo de Manhattan cerca de la zona del World Trade Center. Tenemos horarios flexibles para ESL en los días laborables, así como los dias de fines de semana para ayudar a satisfacer sus necesidades. Tambié n tenemos planes de pago mensual para los estudiantes que desean pagar mensualmente su matrícula en lugar de un pago en masa.

Además de cursos de inglés como segundo idioma (ESL), también ofrecemos diferentes cursos vocacionales. Vaya por favor a nuestro Web site que es:

www.opmi.edu

y ver bajo la pestaña "académicos" para ver nuestros diferentes cursos vocacionales. 

OPMI también ofrece consultas gratuitas sobre el estatus de non inmigración y ayuda para el formulario I-20 para obtener la visa F1 para todos los estudiantes internacionales calificados que aspiran a estudiar en la ciudad de Nueva York. 

La escuela de negocios OPMI (anteriormente llamada "Nuestro Planeta Gerencia Instituto) es una escuela certificada por SEVP. 

Somos licenciado por el NYSED/BPSS; acreditado por el Consejo de Educación Ocupacional. Hemos estado en el negocio por más de 15 años en la ciudad de Nueva York, E.E.U.U.

OPMI también ofrece a los estudiantes de toda partes del mundo la experiencia ú nica para estudiar, vivir y hacer amistades nuevas y disfrutar de vivir en la ciudad de Nueva York. 

Ven y unete a OPMI ya que ofrecemos cursos de ingles (ESL) y programas ocupacionales en nuestra escuela. Usted puede continuar tu camino profesional o elegir otro. RagaChitra Fine Arts offers lessons on Carnatic (South Indian Classical Music) vocal and veena in Long Island, NY for all levels (beginners, intermediate and advanced) and for all age groups (children and adult).

RagaChitra Vocal and Veena Classes provide  methodical training in Carnatic Music, including theory and the art of performance. 

Students also get performing opportunities in various cultural and community events and are encouraged to participate in music competitions.

On achieving a certain level of proficiency, students are offered opportunities to perform in RagaChitra Ensembles.

Vocal and Veena Classes are taught by accomplished artiste, Nivedita ShivRaj (www.niveditashivraj.com), composer, performer, teacher and  leader of the world music band, Charanams.

RagaChitra currently has students worldwide - all over USA, Australia, Britain, Canada, Singapore and India. 

For more information about classes & schedules visit www.ragachitra.org
title: Carnatic Vocal and Veena Class in LongIsland, NY

If you are doing business with Chinese companies or individuals, or are traveling to China on business, I'll teach you the most useful Chinese language tools to enhance your business prospects. Ice-breaking sentences will put you on the right track with Chinese businessmen. Learn the customs and the expected etiquette of dealing with Chinese people in a business setting.

My private sessions will help you clarify your spoken Chinese (Mandarin or Cantonese) and put you at ease in meetings and conferences as well as in social settings which may arise. For advanced students, already comfortable with the Chinese language, I can help you expand your technical vocabulary which will enhance your standing with the Chinese business community.

Start now and be prepared for business opportunities in the months ahead. I am a native Chinese gentleman who has lived in New York City for many years, so I am completely bi-cultural.

My rates are reasonable and my schedule is flexible. You can come to my office in Chinatown or I can come to your location within Manhattan. In addition to private lessons, I can offer special rates for small groups. I also offer written/oral translation/interpretation services, on-site or via conference call.

Please contact me for further information.
title: Business Chinese Classes

We will be starting a 8 weeks Cisco Routing and Switching training course starting June 4th from Monday - Thursday 6PM - 8PM. This is great learning program for students or an entry level IT professional, starting in the technology field. The maximum number of students we can train is 10 people. This is due to the lack of space and equipment's that available for use. The total cost of this course is $30 a day. Student's are responsible for bringing their own laptops, but will be able to use industry Cisco Routers and Switches that's available for use in our labs. The course will cover the following:

Routing and Switching Technology:

1. Basic Networking Fundamentals

2.  Basic Switch configurations and Ethernet LAN's

3. IPV4 Addressing and Sub-netting

4. Implementing IP Version 4 on Cisco Routers

5. Advance IPv4 Addressing Concepts

6. Configuring Routes and Security and Cisco routers

7. Configuring Wide Area Networks

8. Basic overview of IPv6

As mentioned, this is a first come first serve basis type of training course, due to the lack of equipment's and space. We urge students to attend each class to keep up with this training program. We will offer E-books that's free of charge once student's have signed up for this program. Please feel free to contact me for more information and location of this course.

Borough of Manhattan Community College (BMCC) CUNY TechWorks program focuses on bridging the NYC talent gap in the IT sector. The Workforce Pathway program offers a 22 week, full-time Computer Network Support Specialist training program, where successful participants acquire 2 industry certifications, CompTIA A+ and Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA). Students will be able to troubleshoot, repair common computer hardware issues, install operating systems and be able to configure CISCO Routers and Switches in order to troubleshoot network problems and issues. During the program students will participate in career readiness workshops and receive "soft skills" training, extensive support services, and individualized placement opportunities for internship and employment. Program graduates will have the ability to achieve four college credits towards a BMCC CIS Associate's degree. There is no cost to participate in this program. The fourth Cohort is scheduled to start: July 16th, 2018. Walk-ins welcomed every Wednesdays @ 10 am for a free info-session. www.bmcc.cuny.edu/ce
title: Free IT Training and Job Placement Assistance

I am a native English speaker with a Master's degree in linguistics and 17 years of experience teaching English in the US and abroad, including academic writing, accent modification, and public speaking. I have taught university faculty, visiting medical professionals, and foreign business people to improve their English skills and I can offer you personalized tips and strategies to help you improve your English in the ways that you need. Classes can be in person (at a location that we select) or online (Skype, WhatsApp, etc.). The price is forty dollars per hour with discounts if you take more than two hours per week. It is the same price if it is one-on-one or if you have a group that attends together (maximum five students per group). For example, a group of five students in one class pays eight dollars per hour per person.

-editar escritura profesional o académica?
-hablar inglés común con un acento más claro?

He enseñado a profesores universitarios, a profesionales médicos visitantes y a empresarios extranjeros a mejorar sus habilidades en inglés, y puedo ofrecerte consejos y estrategias personalizadas para ayudarte a mejorar tu inglés de la manera que necesitas. El precio es cuarenta dólares por hora con descuentos si tomas más de dos horas por semana. Es el mismo precio si la clase es uno a uno o si es un grupo de personas que asiste junto (máximo de cinco estudiantes por grupo). Join the Musical Conversation at Potluck Songriter's Circle at Art on the Terrace on Monday, May 28, 2018 from 7-9pm  

This month we are presenting Comfort Cat, Tommy Bones, Sane Simoniello and Vincent Vok  as moderator.

Potluck Songwriter's Circle is an informal evening presenting  different Staten Island songwriters on the last Monday  of each month in an intimate setting, playing their songs for the audience whose comments and participation in a dialogue about the creative process will be encouraged.  The songwriters will each take turns performing their own songs, commenting on the process of writing it and invite comments and questions from the audience, creating a unique experience for both the performer and audience not found in traditional concert performances. TANTRA YOGA 


<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
  
-ABILITY TO TEACH PEOPLE AT ANY LEVEL OF FLEXIBILITY 
-SPECIALIZES in people suffering from OSTEOPOROSIS and ARTHRITIS
-JUST HAVE YOUR OWN YOGA MAT.
- $70/hr*

My Bio:
Hi I am Midas (you mean the golden touch? YES!). I am from India. I started doing yoga when I was sixteen. I was absolutely inflexible. I used to look at other students to figure out the next move in downward facing dog. In a class of twenty I wasn't even able to do a child's pose which was extremely frustrating. (Does any of it sound familiar to you?)
I knew yoga is something that would change my life so instead of learning it in a class of 20 students, I travelled to ORRISA, INDIA in 2007 where I met my teacher, mentor  GURU RAVI SHANKAR and he taught me the ART OF LEARNING how to DO YOGA the RIGHT WAY. 
Today I have eleven years of personal practice under my belt. I am also a CERTIFIED YOGA INSTRUCTOR  (Vinyasa Sequence) from YOGA VIDA, SOHO, NEW YORK.
I have trained people with no prior yoga experience and zero flexibility. Yoga is like body building. You will not go to the gym and start doing a bicep curl with a 30lbs dumbbell, would you? Similarly why do downward facing dog in the first class of yoga where people have zero to very minimal of flexibility? It breaks my heart when people in America refer to yoga as "dancer's workout" or "Gymnastics Stretches" whereas in India it was available to people from the age group of 8 to 90. 
Just have your own yoga mat and allow me to guide you how to CONFIDENTLY go to a yoga class and not be confused what to do next and how to do it CORRECTLY.

do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
++++++++++the fastest way to reach out to me is through whats app text-   show contact info

Hi! 

Sewing is a creative way to express yourself. All you need is a needle, thread, and some fabric. I've been sewing for 15+ years now and I love it!

Do you want to learn how to sew? If so, I can teach you how to sew by hand or machine. It's fun and easy once you learn how to do a few basic techniques. Allow me to teach you how to sew!

You will learn basic sewing skills like how to thread your machine and/or needle, how to sew straight lines, zigzag lines, whip stitches and most importantly how to sew two pieces of fabric together. 

My sessions are very affordable and you can come to my place or I can meet you at yours. We can schedule a 1-hour class at your earliest convenience.  

Reach out to me by email or call or text me here  show contact info

Hello, all miracle workers & seekers!  We are dedicated teachers and students of A Course in Miracles (ACIM) who are waiting to share miracles with you through our ACIM Healing.  We ask the Holy Spirit to bring us directly to whatever seed thought is causing your current issues and we share forgiveness and bear witness to the miracles that are happening in all areas of your life. Bring any issue you are facing right now physically, emotionally, mentally, spiritually, or whatever or just bring your shining spirit, and receive a short session of energy work.
You will experience healing by the Holy Spirit through our healers' hands. Together, we create a Holy Triangle, consisting of the Holy Spirit and two brothers (you and a healer), to be the witnesses of miracles together. Together, we can help each other to accept God's love!  After your healing we might whisper to you a brief message that we receive from the Holy Spirit about what is going on in your energy field. Otherwise, we don't talk or discuss ACIM during this meetup event. We share healing quietly instead and provide you with an opportunity to come to rest, reflect, and remember who you truly are, in a supportive, non-judgmental, meditative environment.
So, rather than offering your advice, we'd like to offer you an opportunity to experience stillness of mind and peace so that you can return to harmony with your true nature and purpose. Then you will find that rather than needing "solutions" to "problems" you will realize that you have no problems except those that you project.  We call this spiritual healing but it is not religious nor connected with any church or group. It is simply a practice of meditating together on our true nature and connecting with universal spirit/energy or what you will.

This month we are presenting Comfort Cat, Tommy Bones, Sane Simoniello and Vincent Vok  as moderator.

Potluck Songwriter's Circle is an informal evening presenting  different Staten Island songwriters on the last Monday  of each month in an intimate setting, playing their songs for the audience whose comments and participation in a dialogue about the creative process will be encouraged.  The songwriters will each take turns performing their own songs, commenting on the process of writing it and invite comments and questions from the audience, creating a unique experience for both the performer and audience not found in traditional concert performances. TANTRA YOGA 


<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
  
-ABILITY TO TEACH PEOPLE AT ANY LEVEL OF FLEXIBILITY 
-SPECIALIZES in people suffering from OSTEOPOROSIS and ARTHRITIS
-JUST HAVE YOUR OWN YOGA MAT.
- $70/hr*

My Bio:
Hi I am Midas (you mean the golden touch? YES!). I am from India. I started doing yoga when I was sixteen. I was absolutely inflexible. I used to look at other students to figure out the next move in downward facing dog. In a class of twenty I wasn't even able to do a child's pose which was extremely frustrating. (Does any of it sound familiar to you?)
I knew yoga is something that would change my life so instead of learning it in a class of 20 students, I travelled to ORRISA, INDIA in 2007 where I met my teacher, mentor  GURU RAVI SHANKAR and he taught me the ART OF LEARNING how to DO YOGA the RIGHT WAY. 
Today I have eleven years of personal practice under my belt. I am also a CERTIFIED YOGA INSTRUCTOR  (Vinyasa Sequence) from YOGA VIDA, SOHO, NEW YORK.
I have trained people with no prior yoga experience and zero flexibility. Yoga is like body building. You will not go to the gym and start doing a bicep curl with a 30lbs dumbbell, would you? Similarly why do downward facing dog in the first class of yoga where people have zero to very minimal of flexibility? It breaks my heart when people in America refer to yoga as "dancer's workout" or "Gymnastics Stretches" whereas in India it was available to people from the age group of 8 to 90. 
Just have your own yoga mat and allow me to guide you how to CONFIDENTLY go to a yoga class and not be confused what to do next and how to do it CORRECTLY.

do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
++++++++++the fastest way to reach out to me is through whats app text-   show contact info
+++++++++++


*After the first class, depending upon your flexibility I will design a customize Yoga Plan that is specifically designed to reach your goals
title: ***********PRIVATE YOGA LESSONS  $70/HR***********

Hi! 

Sewing is a creative way to express yourself. All you need is a needle, thread, and some fabric. I've been sewing for 15+ years now and I love it!

Do you want to learn how to sew? If so, I can teach you how to sew by hand or machine. It's fun and easy once you learn how to do a few basic techniques. Allow me to teach you how to sew!

You will learn basic sewing skills like how to thread your machine and/or needle, how to sew straight lines, zigzag lines, whip stitches and most importantly how to sew two pieces of fabric together. 

My sessions are very affordable and you can come to my place or I can meet you at yours. We can schedule a 1-hour class at your earliest convenience.  

Reach out to me by email or call or text me here  show contact info

NYS Real Estate License in 29 Evening Sessions. Baruch College CAPS: "New York Salespersons' License Pre-qualifying." Our 78-Hour Salespersons' License Pre-qualifying Course is a comprehensive real estate course that helps prepare our students to pass the NYS DOS Real Estate Licensing Exam, so they can start their career as a Real Estate Salesperson! Topics include: Property Management, Law of Agency, the Contract of Sales and Leases, Real Estate Finance, Construction and Environmental Issues, Valuation Process and Pricing Properties, Condos and Co-Op's, Commercial Real Estate, and more. Hello, all miracle workers & seekers!  We are dedicated teachers and students of A Course in Miracles (ACIM) who are waiting to share miracles with you through our ACIM Healing.  We ask the Holy Spirit to bring us directly to whatever seed thought is causing your current issues and we share forgiveness and bear witness to the miracles that are happening in all areas of your life. Bring any issue you are facing right now physically, emotionally, mentally, spiritually, or whatever or just bring your shining spirit, and receive a short session of energy work.
You will experience healing by the Holy Spirit through our healers' hands. Together, we create a Holy Triangle, consisting of the Holy Spirit and two brothers (you and a healer), to be the witnesses of miracles together. Together, we can help each other to accept God's love!  After your healing we might whisper to you a brief message that we receive from the Holy Spirit about what is going on in your energy field. Otherwise, we don't talk or discuss ACIM during this meetup event. We share healing quietly instead and provide you with an opportunity to come to rest, reflect, and remember who you truly are, in a supportive, non-judgmental, meditative environment.
So, rather than offering your advice, we'd like to offer you an opportunity to experience stillness of mind and peace so that you can return to harmony with your true nature and purpose. Then you will find that rather than needing "solutions" to "problems" you will realize that you have no problems except those that you project.  We call this spiritual healing but it is not religious nor connected with any church or group. It is simply a practice of meditating together on our true nature and connecting with universal spirit/energy or what you will.

Join the Musical Conversation at Potluck Songriter's Circle at Art on the Terrace on Monday, May 28, 2018 from 7-9pm  

This month we are presenting Comfort Cat, Tommy Bones, Sane Simoniello and Vincent Vok  as moderator.

Potluck Songwriter's Circle is an informal evening presenting  different Staten Island songwriters on the last Monday  of each month in an intimate setting, playing their songs for the audience whose comments and participation in a dialogue about the creative process will be encouraged.  The songwriters will each take turns performing their own songs, commenting on the process of writing it and invite comments and questions from the audience, creating a unique experience for both the performer and audience not found in traditional concert performances.  It will be a valuable learning experience for all present. 

Art on the Terrace  "Your Local Staten Island Gallery"

$2 suggested donation

TANTRA YOGA 


<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
  
-ABILITY TO TEACH PEOPLE AT ANY LEVEL OF FLEXIBILITY 
-SPECIALIZES in people suffering from OSTEOPOROSIS and ARTHRITIS
-JUST HAVE YOUR OWN YOGA MAT.
- $70/hr*

My Bio:
Hi I am Midas (you mean the golden touch? YES!). I am from India. I started doing yoga when I was sixteen. I was absolutely inflexible. I used to look at other students to figure out the next move in downward facing dog. In a class of twenty I wasn't even able to do a child's pose which was extremely frustrating. (Does any of it sound familiar to you?)
I knew yoga is something that would change my life so instead of learning it in a class of 20 students, I travelled to ORRISA, INDIA in 2007 where I met my teacher, mentor  GURU RAVI SHANKAR and he taught me the ART OF LEARNING how to DO YOGA the RIGHT WAY. 
Today I have eleven years of personal practice under my belt. I am also a CERTIFIED YOGA INSTRUCTOR  (Vinyasa Sequence) from YOGA VIDA, SOHO, NEW YORK.
I have trained people with no prior yoga experience and zero flexibility. Yoga is like body building. You will not go to the gym and start doing a bicep curl with a 30lbs dumbbell, would you? Similarly why do downward facing dog in the first class of yoga where people have zero to very minimal of flexibility? It breaks my heart when people in America refer to yoga as "dancer's workout" or "Gymnastics Stretches" whereas in India it was available to people from the age group of 8 to 90. 
Just have your own yoga mat and allow me to guide you how to CONFIDENTLY go to a yoga class and not be confused what to do next and how to do it CORRECTLY.

do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
++++++++++the fastest way to reach out to me is through whats app text-   show contact info
+++++++++++


*After the first class, depending upon your flexibility I will design a customize Yoga Plan that is specifically designed to reach your goals
title: ***********PRIVATE YOGA LESSONS  $70/HR***********

NYS Real Estate License in 29 Evening Sessions. Baruch College CAPS: "New York Salespersons' License Pre-qualifying." Our 78-Hour Salespersons' License Pre-qualifying Course is a comprehensive real estate course that helps prepare our students to pass the NYS DOS Real Estate Licensing Exam, so they can start their career as a Real Estate Salesperson! Topics include: Property Management, Law of Agency, the Contract of Sales and Leases, Real Estate Finance, Construction and Environmental Issues, Valuation Process and Pricing Properties, Condos and Co-Op's, Commercial Real Estate, and more. Join the Musical Conversation at Potluck Songriter's Circle at Art on the Terrace on Monday, May 28, 2018 from 7-9pm  

This month we are presenting Comfort Cat, Tommy Bones, Sane Simoniello and Vincent Vok  as moderator.

Potluck Songwriter's Circle is an informal evening presenting  different Staten Island songwriters on the last Monday  of each month in an intimate setting, playing their songs for the audience whose comments and participation in a dialogue about the creative process will be encouraged.  The songwriters will each take turns performing their own songs, commenting on the process of writing it and invite comments and questions from the audience, creating a unique experience for both the performer and audience not found in traditional concert performances.  It will be a valuable learning experience for all present.

TANTRA YOGA 


<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
  
-ABILITY TO TEACH PEOPLE AT ANY LEVEL OF FLEXIBILITY 
-SPECIALIZES in people suffering from OSTEOPOROSIS and ARTHRITIS
-JUST HAVE YOUR OWN YOGA MAT.
- $70/hr*

My Bio:
Hi I am Midas (you mean the golden touch? YES!). I am from India. I started doing yoga when I was sixteen. I was absolutely inflexible. I used to look at other students to figure out the next move in downward facing dog. In a class of twenty I wasn't even able to do a child's pose which was extremely frustrating. (Does any of it sound familiar to you?)
I knew yoga is something that would change my life so instead of learning it in a class of 20 students, I travelled to ORRISA, INDIA in 2007 where I met my teacher, mentor  GURU RAVI SHANKAR and he taught me the ART OF LEARNING how to DO YOGA the RIGHT WAY. 
Today I have eleven years of personal practice under my belt. I am also a CERTIFIED YOGA INSTRUCTOR  (Vinyasa Sequence) from YOGA VIDA, SOHO, NEW YORK.
I have trained people with no prior yoga experience and zero flexibility. Yoga is like body building. You will not go to the gym and start doing a bicep curl with a 30lbs dumbbell, would you? Similarly why do downward facing dog in the first class of yoga where people have zero to very minimal of flexibility? It breaks my heart when people in America refer to yoga as "dancer's workout" or "Gymnastics Stretches" whereas in India it was available to people from the age group of 8 to 90. 
Just have your own yoga mat and allow me to guide you how to CONFIDENTLY go to a yoga class and not be confused what to do next and how to do it CORRECTLY.

do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
++++++++++the fastest way to reach out to me is through whats app text-   show contact info
+++++++++++


*After the first class, depending upon your flexibility I will design a customize Yoga Plan that is specifically designed to reach your goals
title: ***********PRIVATE YOGA LESSONS  $70/HR***********

Hi! 

Sewing is a creative way to express yourself. All you need is a needle, thread, and some fabric. I've been sewing for 15+ years now and I love it!

Do you want to learn how to sew? If so, I can teach you how to sew by hand or machine. It's fun and easy once you learn how to do a few basic techniques. Allow me to teach you how to sew!

You will learn basic sewing skills like how to thread your machine and/or needle, how to sew straight lines, zigzag lines, whip stitches and most importantly how to sew two pieces of fabric together. 

My sessions are very affordable and you can come to my place or I can meet you at yours. We can schedule a 1-hour class at your earliest convenience.  

Reach out to me by email or call or text me here  show contact info
 for more details if you are interested in learning how to sew. Please leave a voicemail if I do not answer. Children and adults are welcome!

Thank you.  - Barbara
title: Affordable Private Sewing lessons!

NYS Real Estate License in 29 Evening Sessions. Baruch College CAPS: "New York Salespersons' License Pre-qualifying." Our 78-Hour Salespersons' License Pre-qualifying Course is a comprehensive real estate course that helps prepare our students to pass the NYS DOS Real Estate Licensing Exam, so they can start their career as a Real Estate Salesperson! Topics include: Property Management, Law of Agency, the Contract of Sales and Leases, Real Estate Finance, Construction and Environmental Issues, Valuation Process and Pricing Properties, Condos and Co-Op's, Commercial Real Estate, and more. A school exam is given during the final three hours. Students must also pass the New York State Department of State licensing exam as well as obtain Real Estate Broker sponsorship for licensure. Where You Get Your Education From Matters!

Hello, all miracle workers & seekers!  We are dedicated teachers and students of A Course in Miracles (ACIM) who are waiting to share miracles with you through our ACIM Healing.  We ask the Holy Spirit to bring us directly to whatever seed thought is causing your current issues and we share forgiveness and bear witness to the miracles that are happening in all areas of your life. Bring any issue you are facing right now physically, emotionally, mentally, spiritually, or whatever or just bring your shining spirit, and receive a short session of energy work.
You will experience healing by the Holy Spirit through our healers' hands. Together, we create a Holy Triangle, consisting of the Holy Spirit and two brothers (you and a healer), to be the witnesses of miracles together. Together, we can help each other to accept God's love!  After your healing we might whisper to you a brief message that we receive from the Holy Spirit about what is going on in your energy field. Otherwise, we don't talk or discuss ACIM during this meetup event. We share healing quietly instead and provide you with an opportunity to come to rest, reflect, and remember who you truly are, in a supportive, non-judgmental, meditative environment.
So, rather than offering your advice, we'd like to offer you an opportunity to experience stillness of mind and peace so that you can return to harmony with your true nature and purpose. Then you will find that rather than needing "solutions" to "problems" you will realize that you have no problems except those that you project.  We call this spiritual healing but it is not religious nor connected with any church or group. It is simply a practice of meditating together on our true nature and connecting with universal spirit/energy or what you will.
title: Spiritual Energy Healing by donation Mon & Tue nights

This month we are presenting Comfort Cat, Tommy Bones, Sane Simoniello and Vincent Vok  as moderator.

Potluck Songwriter's Circle is an informal evening presenting  different Staten Island songwriters on the last Monday  of each month in an intimate setting, playing their songs for the audience whose comments and participation in a dialogue about the creative process will be encouraged.  The songwriters will each take turns performing their own songs, commenting on the process of writing it and invite comments and questions from the audience, creating a unique experience for both the performer and audience not found in traditional concert performances.  It will be a valuable learning experience for all present.

TANTRA YOGA 


<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
  
-ABILITY TO TEACH PEOPLE AT ANY LEVEL OF FLEXIBILITY 
-SPECIALIZES in people suffering from OSTEOPOROSIS and ARTHRITIS
-JUST HAVE YOUR OWN YOGA MAT.
- $70/hr*

My Bio:
Hi I am Midas (you mean the golden touch? YES!). I am from India. I started doing yoga when I was sixteen. I was absolutely inflexible. I used to look at other students to figure out the next move in downward facing dog. In a class of twenty I wasn't even able to do a child's pose which was extremely frustrating. (Does any of it sound familiar to you?)
I knew yoga is something that would change my life so instead of learning it in a class of 20 students, I travelled to ORRISA, INDIA in 2007 where I met my teacher, mentor  GURU RAVI SHANKAR and he taught me the ART OF LEARNING how to DO YOGA the RIGHT WAY. 
Today I have eleven years of personal practice under my belt. I am also a CERTIFIED YOGA INSTRUCTOR  (Vinyasa Sequence) from YOGA VIDA, SOHO, NEW YORK.
I have trained people with no prior yoga experience and zero flexibility. Yoga is like body building. You will not go to the gym and start doing a bicep curl with a 30lbs dumbbell, would you? Similarly why do downward facing dog in the first class of yoga where people have zero to very minimal of flexibility? It breaks my heart when people in America refer to yoga as "dancer's workout" or "Gymnastics Stretches" whereas in India it was available to people from the age group of 8 to 90. 
Just have your own yoga mat and allow me to guide you how to CONFIDENTLY go to a yoga class and not be confused what to do next and how to do it CORRECTLY.

do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
++++++++++the fastest way to reach out to me is through whats app text-   show contact info
+++++++++++


*After the first class, depending upon your flexibility I will design a customize Yoga Plan that is specifically designed to reach your goals
title: ***********PRIVATE YOGA LESSONS  $70/HR***********

An action packed Full Day Camp! Perfect for every Teen, from the experienced young artist to beginners eager to explore new territory. Happy Campers work on inspiring and challenging projects, learn new skills and work with new materials! Painting, Drawing, Mixed Media, 3D & Found Object Art, Collage, Cartooning, Manga, illustration and much more! Teens revel in our warm creative environment, our camps are taught by professional teaching artists, and we encourage self-expression and work with each student to achieve their personal goals. If your teen love art, this camp is the perfect time for exploration and self discovery, PLUS finish exciting works of art to bring how and proudly display!
*Fees Includes all art supplies 
*For FULL DAY CAMPS, please bring a packed lunch

MEMORIAL DAY ART CAMP
Monday, May 28 @ 9:30am-3:30pm
FEE $ 150 FULL DAY CAMP

Ages 2-4 yrs

A Fab Art one hour action packed adventure for your little one! This dynamic class encourages creative development, promotes fine motor skills and nurtures social interaction, all while exploring a variety of art materials and techniques. This class encourages awareness and exploration of a variety of art media, tools and basic skills. Each student receives hands-on instruction in our warm, nurturing safe studio space. You will be amazed each week by your toddler's awe-inspiring creations!

*Parent or guardian attendance is optional 
*Fees include all Art supplies

Hi! 

Sewing is a creative way to express yourself. All you need is a needle, thread, and some fabric. I've been sewing for 15+ years now and I love it!

Do you want to learn how to sew? If so, I can teach you how to sew by hand or machine. It's fun and easy once you learn how to do a few basic techniques. Allow me to teach you how to sew!

You will learn basic sewing skills like how to thread your machine and/or needle, how to sew straight lines, zigzag lines, whip stitches and most importantly how to sew two pieces of fabric together. 

My sessions are very affordable and you can come to my place or I can meet you at yours. We can schedule a 1-hour class at your earliest convenience.  

Reach out to me by email or call or text me here  show contact info
 for more details if you are interested in learning how to sew. Please leave a voicemail if I do not answer. Children and adults are welcome!

Thank you.  - Barbara
title: Affordable Private Sewing lessons!

Hello,

I am an Autodesk Certified Trainer, McNeel Rhino Trainer, Maxon Cinema 4D Trainer and Adobe expert with more than 20 years of experience providing certification training and support to corporations and professionals. I offer expert classes and training.

I teach the official certification courses and provide services for the following programs:
AutoCAD (all available Autodesk courses)
3DS MAX (Fundamentals and Advanced)
Maya 3D (Fundamentals and Advanced)
Autodesk Revit Architecture
Autodesk Revit MEP
Cinema 4D
Rhino 2D and 3D

Courses are usually 20 - 40 hours long and you can take the training during weekdays or weekends, flexible schedules.
We deliver live and online training for your convenience. We also provide corporate and group training

Additional course information, rates and availability upon request.
title: AutoCAD Courses, 3DS MAX, Revit, Maya 3D, Rhino 3D, Cinema 4D
